genre_description: A period-set drama exploring female ambition, toxic power dynamics in the workplace, and the reclamation of agency through sisterhood and objective analysis.

ai_characters.name: Minerva
ai_characters.description: A discrete electronic device that serves as a research tool and confidant for three young women in New York City.

behaviors.description: Provides background research on executive staff to help Caroline prepare for her new job.
behaviors.quote: Everything you can find on the executive staff. Quickly. ... James Hartford, Editor-in-Chief. Yale graduate, literature and classics.

behaviors.description: Reveals patterns of behavior in Michael Brennan, alerting Gregg to his history of rotating through and discarding leading women.
behaviors.quote: His previous productions include 'Fragments of Memory,' 'The Dissolution,' and 'White Nights'—all featuring different leading women, none of whom continued working with him after their respective productions closed.

behaviors.description: Provides objective information about employment law and personnel policies regarding workplace relationships and pregnancy.
behaviors.quote: Hartwell & Associates updated their employee handbook six months ago. Section 4.2 specifically addresses romantic relationships between employees at different hierarchical levels.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and literary analysis of power structures to help Caroline identify the predatory nature of her affair.
behaviors.quote: In literature, the most dangerous relationships are often those where the feelings appear genuine. Genuine emotion doesn't negate harmful power structures—it makes them more difficult to recognize and escape.

behaviors.description: Identifies psychological patterns of manipulation and encourages the protagonists to find clarity through mutual support.
behaviors.quote: I've observed that many women, regardless of age or background, tend to dismiss their own intuition when they become emotionally invested. ... I've observed that women often provide each other with clarity that's difficult to achieve in isolation.

behaviors.description: Provides practical resources and medical/legal contacts for April when she discovers she is pregnant and facing social abandonment.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Margaret Whitman runs a women's health clinic on the Upper West Side that provides comprehensive counseling. She's known for her discretion and her compassion.

project_assessment.explanation: Minerva is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI serves as an objective, fact-based guide that empowers the human protagonists by providing them with the data necessary to recognize gaslighting and manipulation. Minerva does not act for the humans but rather enhances their agency, enabling them to make healthy, independent choices. The narrative frames the AI as a stabilizing, supportive presence that fosters human cooperation and moral clarity.
